frontMatter.title: Tuomas Salo
frontMatter.summary: Not everything was perfect in 1995, but I think we've lost something on the way. Some remarks: 1) Underlined letters indicate keyboard shortcuts. How handy! 2) Design clearly says: "We are buttons!". It's easy to find the wanted button, because they have some color. 1/3

next.title: Top 13 Open Source Database Software for Your Next Project
next.summary: Open source databases offer flexibility, scalability, and cost savings. They provide robust features for managing data, including relational and non-relational options, plus community of developers that contribute to their ongoing development and support. Here are some top open source databases to consider
